jobDescription: Title: Senior Data Engineer Location: Santa Monica, 90404  Benefits: YES  Immediate fulltime need for a Senior Data Engineer for our client in the Media and Entertainment industry.  The Senior Data Engineer will use ETL processes leveraging Cloud resources to drive rich analysis and reporting. Data is the lifeblood of the organization and this role is integral in collecting, normalizing, transforming, and loading our vast array of data sources.  **For Immediate Consideration please EMAIL your resume to Claire Davidson Claire.Davidson@rht.com**  **Connect with me on LinkedIN https://www.linkedin.com/in/clairedavidsonrht/  This is a full time, direct hire position (not contract)
